releaseNotes:
Noty v1.7 - UI Enhancement Update

• Enhanced Stat Cards: Fixed number display in task and note counters
• Improved Text Readability: Ensured proper text display across different screen sizes
• Layout Optimization: Better vertical spacing and alignment of UI elements
• Visual Consistency: Unified appearance across both portrait and landscape modes
• Accessibility Improvements: Better touch targets and text contrast
• Performance Optimizations: Reduced layout passes for smoother scrolling
• Bug Fixes: Addressed visual glitches in the home screen
